properties.entry: SELECT A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_NM , A.MEM_DATE FROM MEMBER A
SELECT * FROM MEMBER A JOIN WORKOUTLOG B ON A.MEM_ID =B.MEM_ID
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_ID , MEM_NM , MEM_DATE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO WORKOUTLOG ( MEM_ID , LOG_ID , LOG_DATE , LOG_INTIME , LOG_OUTTIME ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? )
INSERT INTO EXERCISE ( LOG_ID , EXR_ID , EXR_nm , EXR_SET , EXR_CNT ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? )
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NM, MEM_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_DATE, WL.LOG_ID, WL.LOG_DATE, WL.LOG_INTIME, WL.LOG_OUTTIME FROM MEMBER M JOIN WORKOUTLOG WL ON M.MEM_ID = WL.MEM_ID WHERE M.MEM_ID = ?

SELECT M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_DATE, WL.LOG_ID, WL.LOG_DATE, WL.LOG_INTIME, WL.LOG_OUTTIME, E.EXR_ID, E.EXR_nm, E.EXR_SET, E.EXR_CNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN WORKOUTLOG WL ON M.MEM_ID = WL.MEM_ID JOIN EXERCISE E ON WL.LOG_ID = E.LOG_ID WHERE M.MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NM = ?, MEM_DATE = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
